name: Running
overview: A classical maze and puzzle game. You run around in a maze and try to catch the ghosts or spiders and to gather coins. Bombs can be used against baddies and to open up sections in the wall for further exploration. It is completely multitasking friendly and compatible with AmigaDOS 1.2/1.3 and 2.0. You can design your own levels. Binary only. Author: Jorrit Tyberghei. It was released as Shareware with a demo and a full version including source.
